title: S3 Ep11: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Episode 7 – Mix Tape
itunes:title: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Episode 7 – Mix Tape
description:
August 20, 2018 / During the initial investigation into the murders of Harold and Thelma Swain, Deputy Butch Kennedy recorded numerous interviews with witnesses and suspects in the case. Those recordings have been lost, and we're left with only a few clues to piece together their contents.

Episode scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions, Patrick Cortes, and Chris Zabriskie.

This episode was sponsored by Boll & Branch.

www.BollandBranch.com promo code UNDISCLOSED for $50 off your first set of sheets.
